title: 【搬运】1.0.0地圖 Skyballs
author: leon119889
txt_content:
最近悶悶的,所以練習一下用中轉站轉mediafire的文件,不廢話了
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
歡迎來到Skyballs！
在這張地圖上，你要利用每一個球的資源，去為了生存和完成挑戰。
Will you fall victim to the evils of night and clumsiness of day?Or will you create the greatest civilization upon your floating islands the world has ever seen?(好吧,造句不會翻譯)您自己來決定！
 

 

箱子內的東西：

 
规则
1. 不要用Mods(No Mods)
2. 不存心死於沒生命值和沒饥饿值?(DO NOT intentionally die for health and hunger)
3.至少玩容易以上的难度(Play on at least easy difficulty)
 
挑战
1.旅行至6个球(产卵(?)不是一个球)     Travel to all 6 balls (spawn is not a ball)
2.制作鹅卵石生成器     Make a cobblestone generator
3.制作所有羊毛     Craft all colored wools
4.盖房子     Build a house
5.制作10個书柜     Craft 10 bookcases
6.制作10個雪傀儡     Make 10 snow golems
7.建立一个工作壁炉(?)     Build a working fireplace
8.建立一个仙人掌农场     Build a cactus farm
9.建立一个怪物陷阱(?)     Build a monster trap
10.去到地獄
 
FAQ:(這個我不翻譯了,懶+不會翻譯)
Q.How do I stop myself from losing the ores?
A.There are various ways but the easiest and most effective is to use water scaffolding to build a platform underneath the ores.
 
Q.How am I going to go to the nether without obsidian?
A.There is obsidian. You may not have been to all the balls yet. (See hint #1)
 
Q.Why did you copy Sky block?
A.There's been tons of sky maps before and after Sky block.
 
Q.How do I get torches?
A.Charcoal works the same as coal.
 
Q.How can I support this map?
A.Tell your friends about it, showcase your achievements, put a link to this thread in your signature.
 
提示
1.100左，100前进
2.三思而行，你不想失去任何珍贵的矿石吧
3.每一个球(島?)都是独一无二的，要完成所有的挑战，都必須前往所有的球(島?)
 
 
 
 
 
好吧,這是最近流行的浮空島生存地圖

這是我第一次搬运,多多支持一下和加分吧
